project.name: ImageResizing.Net
project.description:
A very popular .NET library and HttpModule for dynamic image processing. A extensible plugin architecture (and 38 plugins) allow for a huge variety of tasks to be accomplished. Tested with millions (20TB+) of images and 100k/day image views on a single server. Highly scalable and extremely responsive.
Designed around a simple querystring interface, ex. /image.jpg?width=100&height=100&mode=crop.
Both a C# managed API and the URL API offer the same abilities, making it easy to switch between the two.
